mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ICT_RECIPE ( RNUM, RSUBJECT, RCONTENT, RPHOTO, RJERYO, RTIME, RPERSON, RDIFF, RCATEGORY, WARNING, MNUM, RHIT, DELETEYN, INSERTDATE, UPDATEDATE ) VALUES ( #{ rnum }, #{ rsubject }, #{ rcontent }, #{ rphoto }, #{ rjeryo }, #{ rtime }, #{ rperson }, #{ rdiff }, #{ rcategory }, #{ warning }, #{ mnum }, 0, 'Y', SYSDATE, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT A.RNUM RNUM ,A.RSUBJECT RSUBJECT ,A.RCONTENT RCONTENT ,A.RPHOTO RPHOTO ,A.RJERYO RJERYO ,A.RTIME RTIME ,A.RPERSON RPERSON ,A.RDIFF RDIFF ,A.RCATEGORY RCATEGORY ,A.WARNING WARNING ,A.MNUM MNUM ,A.RHIT RHIT ,A.DELETEYN DELETEYN ,A.INSERTDATE INSERTDATE ,A.UPDATEDATE UPDATEDATE FROM ICT_RECIPE A WHERE A.DELETEYN = 'Y' ORDER BY 1
